attributes.action: Increase child maintenance service powers to investigate the self employed
attributes.additional_details: Increase child maintenance service powers to investigate the self employed
attributes.background: Self employed absent parents are getting away with paying child maintenance having dodgy accountants and also dodgying paying tax

rejection.details:
The Child Maintenance Service already has a number of enforcement powers, but if you are concerned about arrangements for child maintenance for self-employed non-resident parents we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

End CMS loop-holes for parents who hide their income through Limited Companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582147
